import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import '../public/style/components/header.css' import { Row, Col, Menu, Drawer } from 'antd' import Link from 'next/link' import { RadarChartOutlined, AreaChartOutlined, CrownOutlined, PlaySquareOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const list = [ { icon: 'CrownOutlined', name: 'javaScript', id: '1' }, { icon: 'CrownOutlined', name: 'Python', id: '2' }, { icon: 'CrownOutlined', name: 'Node', id: '3' } ] const Header = () => { const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [clas, serClas] = useState(0); const showDrawer = () => { setVisible(true); serClas(1) if (visible === true) { setVisible(false); serClas(0) } }; const onClose = () => { setVisible(false); serClas(0) }; return (
Stone
一个热爱编程的小菜鸟
首页 JavaScript Python Node
首页 { list.map((item, index) => { return < item.icon className='ftz' /> {item.name} }) }
) } export default Header
